short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your daily dose of Bible verses and optimized search right to your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be reminded of God’s promises constantly.

This extension sets your default search engine to Yahoo and your new tab page to Daily Bible Reflection for daily inspiration every time you use your browser.

- Strengthen your faith and always be encouraged with Bible verses - right on your Chrome new tab page
- Bible verses displayed changes daily ensuring a fresh reminder from the Word
- Share daily Bible verse to your Facebook or X account
- Enrich your knowledge of the Bible daily with question of the day
- Change your wallpaper with our selection of breathtaking images

Daily Bible Reflection Search encourages you to read your Bible daily in a place where you least expect it - your Chrome New Tab page - and enhances your Bible search capabilities with Yahoo.

Click “Add to Chrome” to install Daily Bible Reflections Search for Free.

Adding this extension to Chrome sets your default search engine to Yahoo and your new tab page to Daily Bible Reflection.
